subject: Re: Uninstalling perl module
body:
I

2007/4/13, yaron@kahanovitch.com :
> Hi,
>
> I am using cpan to install modules.
> From time to time I have to uninstall a module.
> Untill now I did not find a tool to do it.
> Is there an official tool for this?

Hello,

I don't think there is such an uninstall tool for you.
by the way,why do you need to uninstall a module?if you don't need it
again,just ignore it.If this module is wrtten by yourself and you
don't use it anymore,you can just delete that .pm file.


-- 
mailto: pangj@earthlink.net
http://home.arcor.de/jeffpang/
